header: Introduction to the Book of Consolation

verse: “The Lord God of Israel says, ‘Write everything that I am about to tell you in a scroll.

For I, the Lord, affirm that the time will come when I will reverse the plight of my people, Israel and Judah,’ says the Lord. ‘I will bring them back to the land I gave their ancestors and they will take possession of it once again.’”

header: Israel and Judah Will Be Delivered after a Time of Deep Distress

verse: So here is what the Lord has to say about Israel and Judah.
Yes, here is what he says:

header: The Lord Will Heal the Wounds of Judah

verse: Moreover, the Lord says to the people of Zion:

header: The Lord Will Restore Israel and Judah
